name: Options for Twenty Nineteen
author: Webd Ltd

sections.description:
Options for Twenty Nineteen

This plugin is for Twenty Nineteen theme, please see our other plugins for Twenty Seventeen, Twenty Twenty, Twenty Twenty-One and Block Themes like Twenty Twenty-Two and Twenty Twenty-Three.

This plugin adds the following modification options to the default WordPress theme Twenty Nineteen …

General Options

  • Change the default base font size.
  • Hides theme’s dashes.

Header Options

  • Allow custom sized logo.
  • Change the width of the logo.
  • Remove the white background behind the logo.
  • Align the site title and description to the left, center or right.

Navigation Options

  • Change the font size for the main menu.
  • Choosse font sizes for child and grandchild sub menu items.

Content Options

  • Choose page title font weight.
  • Choose page title font case.
  • Choose location(s) of post date / author line.
  • Hides the posted on date with CSS.
  • Hides the post author with CSS.

Footer Options

  • Choose a background color for the footer.
  • Remove the “Proudly powered by WordPress” text displayed in the website footer.
  • More coming soon … request a feature in the Support Forum!

General Color Options

  • Choose a background color for the site.
  • Adjust the default opacity level on featured images.
  • Adds a control to choose a primary colour using HEX colour picker.
  • Adds more controls to change the saturation and lightness of the primary color.

… and the following options for users who have upgraded to the premium plugin …

  • Show Featured Image and / or Page Title on Posts Page.
  • Reposition the logo above the site title.
  • Align repositioned logo to the left, center or right.
  • Remove the circular mask around the logo.
  • Hide the site title and / or description.
  • Inject a “Scroll to Content” arrow in the header.
  • Use a Dashicon for the “Scroll to Content” and / or make it bounce.
  • Choose your own Dashicon for the “Scroll to Content” arrow.
  • Implement Yoast SEO Breadcrumbs on single posts and pages.
  • Show Tag and Category archive descriptions.
  • Show full post content on archive pages.
  • Turn on Jetpack’s infinite scroll.
  • Replace the “Proudly powered by WordPress” with your own text.
  • Add support for Jetpack’s “Featured Content”
  • Hide featured images on single posts and pages
  • Hide titles on single posts and pages
  • More coming soon
sections.installation:
Easily use this plugin to modify WordPress default Twenty Nineteen theme …

1) Install “Options for Twenty Nineteen” automatically or by uploading the ZIP file.
2) Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
3) Find the additional features by clicking “Customize” in the “Appearance” admin menu.
sections.faq:
Why can’t I change the fonts?

Changing fonts in a WordPress theme is not a customisation that is limited to Twenty Nineteen. There are lots of plugins out there that already perform this task. We use TK Google Fonts for example.

sections.reviews:
Awesome plugin with excellent support

By mikeshouts on November 14, 2022

I have been using Options for Twenty-Nineteen since, well, 2019. Was won over by the plugin that I upgraded to the paid version. Never look back since. I have heard that it has superb support and today, I found out that is not a myth. It is real. Ran into some problems and the response to my call for help was swift. Happy customer.

Perfect add on

By bakkel on October 18, 2021

I've been using this theme foor a few years now and this plugin is the perfect add on to have more control over what kind of info you want to show. Besides the plugin, the aftercare from the developers is simply fantastic! Highly recommending this plugin for every user of the twenty-nineteen theme.

Good customer support on this plugin

By Namita (Namita.nl) on July 24, 2021

I had request for this plugin, it was rolled out within a couple of days. Really nice that it is still supported since the theme is a bit older. I found the communication friendly and helpful. The plugin is very easy to use and very straightforward. Saved me a lot of time.

Really helpful for customizing TwentyNineteen

By Ty (tynanpower) on June 27, 2021

I discovered the Options for Twenty Nineteen plugin because I was looking for a way to customize theme colors with specific hex-code colors. Once I got it, I discovered it has a lot of other helpful options to customize the theme. Some I particularly like include checkboxes that hide the dashes that the theme includes in certain places and display the page title on the "posts" page. While it's possible to control these things by changing the style.css page, this plugin made it much easier to make those changes.

Excellent support

By estherkamara92 on April 22, 2021

I use this plugin to manage the blog of one of my clients. Even when using the free version this plugin allows for a lot of functionality. When I stumbled upon a bug and contacted customer support, Oliver helped me out real well. His response was super quick and detailed, and helpful as well.

Did everythng I needed it to do!

By redmondjv on February 20, 2021

A neat little plugin for expanding the parameters of 2019.

Nice plugin, Great Customer Service

By 3fires on August 28, 2020

Plugin gave me several options I needed to change elements in the template, and many more I didn't realize I wanted until after purchasing.

Very useful plugin

By montparnos on August 20, 2020

A perfect plugin to make Twenty nineteen theme fully customizable. Simple, intuitive and the support is quick and very professional. Highly recommended!

Don't need site title at the bottom in infinite scroll

By David (yerknain) on October 21, 2019

How do I remove site title in infinite scroll and "scroll to top" at all? It appears at the bottom. Useless thing at all. In general the infinite scroll looks awesome! Thank you!

I like it!

By olasarri on February 19, 2019

A nice little plugin that works well, and the author is open to new suggestions.

short_description: Adds powerful customizer options to modify all aspects of the default WordPress theme Twenty Nineteen.
